# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

from knitter.webelement import WebElement
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By


[文档]class FunctionPermissionList():

[文档]    class FunctionPermissionItem(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//span[@class = 'pop-role-list-item' and text() = '#@FuncPermissionName']")

        def __init__(self):
            by = WebElement.by
            value = WebElement.value


[文档]        def Click(self, FuncPermissionName):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@FuncPermissionName', FuncPermissionName)
            super(FunctionPermissionList.FunctionPermissionItem, self).Click()



[文档]        def VerifyExistence(self, FuncPermissionName, TrueOrFalse=True):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@FuncPermissionName', FuncPermissionName)
            super(FunctionPermissionList.FunctionPermissionItem, self).VerifyExistence(TrueOrFalse)

[文档]    class Public(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//span[text()='公共权限']/../span[text()='隐藏']")



[文档]class FunctionPermissoionContentList():

[文档]    class PermissionInput(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//span[text()='资产报警信息']/../div/div[contains(@class,'pop-radio-button')][3]/input")



[文档]    class FunctionPermissionDetail(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//span[text()='#@Name']/../div/div[contains(@class,'pop-radio-button')]")
        index = 0

        def __init__(self):
            by = WebElement.by
            value = WebElement.value
            index = WebElement.index


[文档]        def Click_None(self, name):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            super(FunctionPermissoionContentList.FunctionPermissionDetail, self).Click()



[文档]        def Click_OnlyCheck(self, name):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            self.index = 1
            super(FunctionPermissoionContentList.FunctionPermissionDetail, self).Click()



[文档]        def Click_All(self, name):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            self.index = 2
            super(FunctionPermissoionContentList.FunctionPermissionDetail, self).Click()



[文档]        def Verify_Selected_None(self, name):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            self.index = 0
            super(FunctionPermissoionContentList.FunctionPermissionDetail, self).VerifyAttribute('class', 'selected', 'contain')



[文档]        def Verify_Selected_OnlyCheck(self, name):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            self.index = 1
            super(FunctionPermissoionContentList.FunctionPermissionDetail, self).VerifyAttribute('class', 'selected',
                                                                                                'contain')


[文档]        def Verify_Selected_All(self, name):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            self.index = 2
            super(FunctionPermissoionContentList.FunctionPermissionDetail, self).VerifyAttribute('class', 'selected',
                                                                                                'contain')
